title: Maid To Crown
description: Daisy Parsons is determined to live her dream of traveling the world.Daisy thinks she’s hit the jackpot when she lands her dream job. A job that will take her places without climbing the corporate ladder. What could be better than working as the new maid on the wealthy Bettencourt’s family yacht? However, Daisy has no idea what she’s in for. Not only does the family have enough wealth to go anywhere they wish, there’s another bonus: a son with a stomach-fluttering smile. Dreamy Matt soon becomes the highlight of Daisy’s day.A friendship quickly blossoms until Daisy realizes she gets more than she bargained for - A shocking truth about the dreamy man she shares her every secret with. Will she forgive Matt for keeping her in the dark? Can he convince her to give him a second chance?Rewarding job. Perfect guy. Great future. With everything so right, what can possibly go wrong? Daisy is about to find out.
author: Angelique Bosman
